name: visual-captcha-npm-fastify-ready
description: Fork of visualCaptcha-npm's Bruno Bernardino <me@brunobernardino.com> https://www.npmjs.com/package/visualcaptcha modified to be fastify webserver ready!

scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/unit/*.js
